title: Introduction to Quarto Projects
---

::: {.callout-note title="Learning Objectives"}
1.  Create a Quarto project
2.  Learn about the different formats available for a Quarto project
3.  Learn about using global options for project-level settings
:::

For this session, we will be covering the following topic:

1.  <https://carpentries-incubator.github.io/reproducible-publications-quarto/09-advanced-chunk.html>

You may notice that the title of today's Carpentries tutorial is "Advanced Code Chunk Options"; this tutorial covers some of the options that we can use for controlling output of a Quarto project. Some of the material we will cover in this session is explained a bit more here (<https://r4ds.hadley.nz/quarto-formats#websites-and-books>) and here (<https://quarto-tdg.org/projects>).
